item.title: May 16th 2024
item.description: One of my favorite people on the internet is the writer, podcaster, and productivity extraordinaire Merlin Mann. I’ve been following Merlin since he co-created the podcast Do By Friday, which led to discoveries of all of his podcasts on the Relay FM network. His recent passion project is something that he’s been calling “Merlin’s Wisdom Project,” and it’s one of my favorite things to peruse when I find myself bored on my computer. It’s basically just a bulleted list of easily digestible wisdom told from the perspective of Merlin based on his own life experience.
item.dc:creator: Jake Smith

item.title: Pace Pro
item.description: PacePro is ultimately a gift to me, but I published it to the app store, hoping runners of all levels will find it as helpful as I intended.
item.dc:creator: Jake Smith
